title: Ainsworth toddler secure attachment and babysitter

content.question: Research indicates that a toddler with a secure attachment style is most likely to do which of the following when left with a caregiver, such as a babysitter, for the first time?

choices.label: Show distress when left, calm down and play, and run to the mother when she returns
Cry when left and continue to cry until the mother returns
Not notice when the mother leaves and not seek attention from the mother when she returns
Show distress when the mother leaves and not seek attention when the mother returns

content.answer: Show distress when left, calm down and play, and run to the mother when she returns

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
